RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Helio HEC time based query V1.16.25
RESOURCE.INFO: SELECT ulysses_grb_xray_flare.HEC_id,ulysses_grb_xray_flare.time_start,ulysses_grb_xray_flare.time_start_earth,ulysses_grb_xray_flare.r_hgi,ulysses_grb_xray_flare.lat_hgi,ulysses_grb_xray_flare.long_hgi FROM ulysses_grb_xray_flare WHERE time_start>='2003-02-01T00:00:00' AND time_start<='2003-02-10T00:00:00' LIMIT 100 OFFSET 0

FIELD.name: time_start
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The time the X-ray flare events were detected by Ulysses

FIELD.name: time_start_earth
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The time the corresponding event was detected near the Earth by the GOES spacecraft.

FIELD.name: r_hgi
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The heliocentric distance of Ulysses at the time of the event.

FIELD.name: lat_hgi
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The heliocentric latitude of Ulysses at the time of the event.

FIELD.name: long_hgi
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The heliocentric longitude of Ulysses at the time of the event.
